title: I'm Impressed For Only $80! - Logitech G435
description: Get 10% off all Jackery products with code LinusTechTips at   Logitech might have a real winner here at the budget tier of gaming headsets with the G435. They might look like something you find in the toy section, but they might be the ideal gift for the little gamer in your life. You might want to buy a separate microphone, though.
